pr_title: [CALCITE-3781] HintStrategy can specify excluded rules for planner

timeline.message:
[CALCITE-3781] HintStrategy can specify excluded rules for planner

It is efficient to support exclude rules explicitly for some hints, i.e.
USE_MERGE, NO_USE_HASH.

timeline.bodyText: Should this be evaluated before the rule is added to the match queue?

replies.bodyText: It's hard to do that, because the operands can be matched from children to parent (ASENDING), for current implementation, i only want to match the root operand of the final match.
